title: BlobCat
notes: There are minor Graphical glitches and it doesn't quit properly

title: Divinity Original Sin 2 Definitive Edition
notes:
1. Install through Steam

2. Make a seperate wineprefix with DXVK 71 and xaudio2_7 (native, builtin) and 

3. run EoCApp.exe directly without Steam (GameFolder/DefEd/EoCApp.exe)

DO NOT ALT+TAB
